title: Three dead and eight wounded in shooting at Brooklyn lounge in New York
description: Police Commissioner Jessica Tisch said multiple shooters were involved in the incident at the Crown Heights venue, with at least 36 shell casings recovered.
content:
Three men have been killed and another eight people injured in an overnight shooting at a lounge in New York.
NYPD said multiple shooters were involved in the incident after a "dispute" and a hunt is under way to find those responsible.
The shooting ... [1346 chars]

title: Why antibiotics are like fossil fuels
description: They helped create the modern world but are dangerously overused. How can we harness them sustainably?
content: In 1954, just a few years after the widespread introduction of antibiotics, doctors were already aware of the problem of resistance. Natural selection meant that using these new medicines gave an advantage to the microbes that could survive the assau... [8159 chars]

title: Government orders striking Air Canada flight attendants to return to work
description: Union criticises move less than 12 hours after start of action that has left more than 100,000 travellers stranded
content: The Canadian government has forced flight attendants at Air Canada back to work less than 12 hours after they began striking and ordered binding arbitration over a dispute that has left more than 100,000 travellers stranded around the world during th... [3964 chars]

title: Protesters go on strike in Israel demanding ceasefire and release of Gaza hostages
description: The campaign escalated on Sunday, with demonstrators staging a "day of stoppage" that blocked traffic and closed businesses.
content:
More than 30 people have been arrested in Israel for "disruption of order" as families of hostages held in Gaza step up their campaign with a nationwide strike.
Protestors are demanding the Israel government make a deal to secure the release of hosta... [3697 chars]

title: Why is Zelenskyy bringing a posse of European leaders to the US for peace talks?
description: European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said she will join the talk "at the request of President Zelenskyy", adding that she "and other European leaders" will be meeting at the White House on Monday.
content:
A posse of European leaders will join the meeting between Donald Trump and Volodymyr Zelenskyy in Washington.
